attributes.action: FUTURE UK BREXIT DEAL MUST BE APPROVED BY UK PARLIAMENT & VIA A 2ND REFERENDUM.
attributes.background:
Article 50 not triggered until new Tory PM elected.
Cross party team should bring a number of options before Parliament.
Brexit deal aim is to get the best deal for the UK & does not favour any region in the UK.
Best Brexit deal to get majority approval from the UK voters by 2nd referendum.
